short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decrypts `openssl aes-256-cbc -pbdkf2 -iter -a` encrypted files on github.com and caches passwords in memory

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decrypts `openssl aes-256-cbc -pbdkf2 -iter 1000 -a` encrypted files on github.com and caches passwords in memory
